name: Dungeon 'n Dice
description:
<- Controls 'n Tips ->
  • Left click to throw dice 
  • WASD to move
  • You can pick up the dice by walking into it once it stops spinning
  • Try Hitting multiple Skulls with one throw for maximum efficiency 
  • If your dice fly's out of bounds, all skulls you hit get untagged :(
<- About ->

Made in 48 Hours for the GMTK-2022 Jam
